title: unai aNugi
sahitya:
unai aNugip-paNiyum enai nI aNaivAi anuvAvi sunaiyOram amarum en kumarA


anupallavi

  paNindiDum aDiyAr paDumiDar aDiyODu parandODi viDum aruL purindiDum ayyanE


caraNam    aruvip-punal OyAdu peruguvadaip-pOlavE aruL unadum perugi aDiyEnaik-kaDai tETri
perumidam urumOr nirai vAzhvai nAn pera varaiyillAda krpai kUra vENum ayyanE
